scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run copy:core && npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:vendor
scripts.copy:core: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html main.css dist/
scripts.copy:vendor: mkdir -p dist && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp package-lock.json dist/package-lock.json && cd dist && npm ci --production && rm -rf vendor && mv node_modules vendor
scripts.test: htmlhint 'index.html' && stylelint main.css && npx linkinator index.html -ro --recurse --skip '(.*\.reddit\.com)|(.*\.twitter\.com)' --verbosity debug
scripts.start: npm run build && npm-run-all --parallel start:server start:watch
